name: Read em'n'Reap
description:
Shoot the symbols off of the cards to create poker hands in this little FPS created for CGX Grad Jam 2021

Watch us in action as we create the game in 48 hour!

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Crouch: Ctrl
Interact: E
Aim and Shoot: Mouse+M1
Reload: R
Pause: ESC
